description: Detects passwords dumps from Keychain Author: Tim Ismilyaev, oscd.community, Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Credentials from Password Stores - Keychain
query: ((process.executable:"\/usr\/bin\/security" AND process.command_line:(*find\-certificate* OR *\ export\ *)) OR process.command_line:(*\ dump\-keychain\ * OR *\ login\-keychain\ *))
